H0.text: Genghis Khan led what group of people. Turkic

H1.text: Genghis Khan led what group of people. Manchu

H2.text: Genghis Khan led what group of people. Tatar

H3.text: Genghis Khan led what group of people. MONGOL

A4.text: Genghis Khan became the undisputed ruler of not only Mongolia, but a newly unified people.

A5.text: The Mongols were reduced to comparative penury; other tribes, such as the Naimans in the west of the plateau and Kerait in the centre, became much more powerful, while the Mongols competed with smaller tribes like the Merkit and the Tatars, the allies of the Jin, in the east and north.
